description.@en: My words may be frightening, yes, but that’s precisely the point.

system.notes:
Intellectual Trait

Professions of this Archetype are learned, lettered and understand the value of the written word. They are of higher means, malleable and socially mobile.

effect.@en: When you succeed at an Education Test, spend a Coin to provoke Stress in one foe who can see and hear you clearly.
